doc:
Don Taylor (American actor and director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Taylor_(American_actor_and_director) 0 Donald Richie Taylor (December 13, 1920 – December 29, 1998) was an American actor and film director. He co-starred in 1940s and 1950s classics, including the 1948 film noir The Naked City, Battleground, Father of the Bride, Father's Little Dividend and Stalag 17. He later turned to directing films such as Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971), Tom Sawyer (1973), and Damien: Omen II (1978). Donald_Richie_Taylor ( December_13_,_1920 – December_29_,_1998 ) was an_American_actor_and_film_director . He co-starred in 1940s_and_1950s_classics , including the_1948_film noir The_Naked_City , Battleground , Father of the_Bride , Father 's_Little_Dividend_and_Stalag_17 . He later turned to directing_films such_as Escape from the_Planet of the_Apes ( 1971_) , Tom_Sawyer_(_1973_) , and Damien : Omen_II ( 1978_) .
